name: Hold the punch (cahizoku)
description:
It just occurred to me to do something and I just want to express my love for furry and martial arts, and that's how this idea came about.

English is not my native language and most of it is done through a translator, although the menu itself is in another language to play, you just need to press enter.

this game is a test of the engine and my abilities, so all the pictures are in a different style from paint to traditional ink, I would be grateful if you could tell me what you liked more

there are 4 littele endings depending on what you are doing so you can try them all

I wonder if there will be someone who will share my love for this.
